title: freeware fonts with Greek characters?
content:
hello. I’m very interested in beautiful fonts.  
unfortunately Greek fonts are something hard to get.  
anyone knows a good site with free fonts in Greek?  
Ευχαριστώ {thanx)

 [‹ 3D typography like Dimensional Typography by J Abbott Miller](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194414/http:/typophile.com/node/34885 "Go to previous forum topic") [Handmade Type ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194414/http:/typophile.com/node/18863 "Go to next forum topic")

comments.content:
[FAQ Free](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194414/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FAQ%252BFree)  
there’s a listing of two sources there: [backpacker](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194414/http:/typophile.com/wiki/backpacker) and [greek font society](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194414/http:/typophile.com/wiki/greek%252Bfont%252Bsociety).
The GFS fonts are the biggest steal of the century. They’re Opentype fonts with all the fixins like small caps, etc. Some of the outlines are questionable, but hey, the price is right.
Paul...what is ’backpacker’ referring to? I don’t see it mentioned on the FAQ Free page.

There are also eight new font families in Windows Vista with good Greek sets, and most are also in Microsoft Office 2007.

Cheers, Si
